func normalize[D: static[int]](x: var IxMap[D]) {.inline.}
Nulls out the stride of axes that are one or less in length. This has no functional effect on the coordinates the index map describes, but is useful for broadcasting. Source   Edit   
func revert[D: static[int]](x: var IxMap[D])
Reset strides and offset based on shape to their default state, so it is row-major covering the range 0 ..< size. Source   Edit
